item.title: 06 May 2025 21:30
item.description: Spotted right in the same building as the Douala Embassy Branch Office. These folks are goddamn everywhere! There’s so little I knew about this firm back in 2015. Three good years doing some real fun work, but I’m so glad I walked out that April 1st ! ðŸ”—
